adrFormatAddress: 59 Greenwich Ave, New York, NY 10014, USA

originalText.text: Payton is a genius. I can come to him with wild ideas and bizarre color combinations and he always makes me feel fabulous. The color also holds really well with the right care and attention -- I still look great months after seeing him. Really like the salon space too: clean, spacious, modern, and a good atmosphere. I always look forward to my appointments all week before I come in!

text.text: Payton is a genius. I can come to him with wild ideas and bizarre color combinations and he always makes me feel fabulous. I always look forward to my appointments all week before I come in!

originalText.text: Adore Chaz Dean’s newest salon in NYC! I got an amazing cut, color and blowout. The candles smell amazing!! Love all his products. Very friendly staff.

text.text: Adore Chaz Dean’s newest salon in NYC! I got an amazing cut, color and blowout. The candles smell amazing!! Love all his products. Very friendly staff.

originalText.text:
What a stellar experience at the Chaz Dean Studio NYC! Firstly, seeing Payton was absolutely transformative. Payton is a true artist and knows how to guide his clients to both the look they want and the look that will help them to be their truly best selves. Every time I go to see Payton, I come out wholly transformed and absolutely delighted. Seeing Payton is not just seeing a hair stylist but a hair genius!!! I love every single look Payton has created for me, but this latest one was just indescribably amazing. I have gotten approximately 1,000 compliments on it in the last 24 hours, coming from my closest friends to strangers on the street, and I have pointed everyone to the Chaz Dean Studio in NYC! If you want your hair to help you feel your best and express yourself in an unprecedented way, go to see Payton!

Of course, the studio itself was beautiful as well! It's clean, spacious, and so relaxing. There's a patio right outside the second floor, and it's filled with plants that sway in the wind!!! The room is full of sun and is lovely!!! What a true oasis in NYC! Everyone was so welcoming and friendly, from Chaz Dean himself to Stephanie at the front desk and everyone else I met along the way! My visit was a five-star experience that you'd be lucky to have too!

originalText.text: Ben at Chaz Dean Studio NYC is a talented stylist. His attention to detail, cut and styling with my thick long hair have transformed it into an easy to manage style. He is lovely along with the whole staff. Have been using Wen haircare products for years and was happy to know the same attention to quality and detail are given at the NYC salon. Highly recommend booking a visit!

text.text: Ben at Chaz Dean Studio NYC is a talented stylist. His attention to detail, cut and styling with my thick long hair have transformed it into an easy to manage style. He is lovely along with the whole staff. Have been using Wen haircare products for years and was happy to know the same attention to quality and detail are given at the NYC salon. Highly recommend booking a visit!

originalText.text:
I cannot say enough good things about the salon, and especially about Chaz Dean. The salon is a lovely warm and welcoming environment!
I have been using Wen products exclusively For 15 years. As a senior, my hair has never been in better condition. These products are pure genius as is the designer of the Wen products.
My haircut by Chaz is simply perfect,  cut with precision and care, like I have never experienced in the past.
It was such a pleasure meeting Chaz, he is so talented and sweet. I cannot say enough good things about my experience in the Chaz Dean Studio.
I would highly recommend the salon, and specifically a Chaz Dean haircut, and all of the Wen hair care products.
Thank you Chaz for providing my wonderful experience. As I told you, you have been on my bucket list since I first started to use your cleansing conditioner. My experience was every bit as wonderful as I had hoped it would be. God bless.
